description:
Description: GENERAL 35MPA 20MM C1
Description: GENERAL CONCRETE 60 MPA 14MM NON AIR 56 DAY EVOBUILD SILVER
This Environmental Product Declaration (EPD) reports theimpacts for 1 m of ready mixed concrete mix, meeting thefollowing specifications:
ASTM C94: Ready-Mixed Concrete
UNSPSC Code 30111505: Ready Mix Concrete
CSA A23.1/A23.2: Concrete Materials and Methods ofConcrete Construction
CSI Division 03-30-00: Cast-in-Place Concrete
name: Mix GC35E54B2C08
